name: Tinet
description: TINET is a company that delivers impact solutions and growing advantage for its clients. Our team is passionate to add value and solve problems. Since 2002, we have developed a great trusted relationship with our clients and partners. Our principle is "add value to our clients by a team of excellence, with a long term strategic vision"​. Our work is intended to provide a benefit to the organizations we work with.

locations.address: Bernarda Morín 510, Providencia. Santiago. Agustinas 1185 of. 81 Santiago Centro. Arlegui 333 of. 216
